   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Common test
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([no_auth/0,
   43:          no_auth/1,
   44:          auth/0,
   45:          auth/1,
   46:          client_auth_custom_key/0,
   47:          client_auth_custom_key/1,
   48:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   49:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   50:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   51:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   52:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   55:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   56:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   57:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   58:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   59:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   60:          client_auth_sni/0,
   61:          client_auth_sni/1,
   62:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/0,
   63:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/1,
   64:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   65:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   66:          missing_root_cert_auth/0,
   67:          missing_root_cert_auth/1,
   68:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/0,
   69:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/1,
   70:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/0,
   71:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/1,
   72:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/0,
   73:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/1,
   74:          verify_fun_always_run_client/0,
   75:          verify_fun_always_run_client/1,
   76:          verify_fun_always_run_server/0,
   77:          verify_fun_always_run_server/1,
   78:          incomplete_chain_auth/0,
   79:          incomplete_chain_auth/1,
   80:          no_chain_client_auth/0,
   81:          no_chain_client_auth/1,
   82:          invalid_signature_client/0,
   83:          invalid_signature_client/1,
   84:          invalid_signature_server/0,
   85:          invalid_signature_server/1,
   86:          critical_extension_auth/0,
   87:          critical_extension_auth/1,
   88:          critical_extension_client_auth/0,
   89:          critical_extension_client_auth/1,

   93:          extended_key_usage_auth/1,
   94:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/0,
   95:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/1,
   96:          extended_key_usage_mixup_client/0,
   97:          extended_key_usage_mixup_client/1,
   98:          extended_key_usage_mixup_server/0,
   99:          extended_key_usage_mixup_server/1,
  100:          extended_key_usage_ca/0,
  101:          extended_key_usage_ca/1,
  102:          extended_key_usage_ca_invalid/0,
  103:          extended_key_usage_ca_invalid/1,
  104:          extended_key_usage_ca_any/0,
  105:          extended_key_usage_ca_any/1,

  149: 
  150: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  151: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: 
  154: all() ->
  155:     [
  156:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  157:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  158:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  159:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  160:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  161:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  162:     ].
  163: 
  164: groups() ->
  165:     [
  166:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()}, 
  167:      {'tlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  168:      {'tlsv1.1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  169:      {'tlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  170:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  171:      {'dtlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  172:      {rsa, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer]},
  173:      {ecdsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
  174:      {dsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
  175:      {rsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++
  176:           tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer, basic_rsa_1024]},
  177:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_2_rsa_tests()},
  178:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  179:      {rsa_pss_pss, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
  180:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  181:      {ecdsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++
  182:           [signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1,
  183:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1,
  184:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1]},
  185:      {eddsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  186:     ].
  187: 
  188: ssl_protocol_groups() ->
  189:     [{group, rsa},
  190:      {group, dsa}].
  191: 
  192: tls_1_2_protocol_groups() ->
  193:     [{group, rsa},
  194:      {group, ecdsa},
  195:      {group, dsa},
  196:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  197:      {group, rsa_pss_pss}
  198:     ].
  199: 
  200: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  201:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  202:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  203:      {group, eddsa_1_3},
  204:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  205:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3}
  206:     ].
  207: 
  208: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  209:     [
  210:      hello_retry_request,
  211:      custom_groups,
  212:      client_auth_no_suitable_chain,
  213:      cert_auth_in_first_ca,
  214:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  215:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  216:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  217:      server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  218:     ].
  219: 
  220: pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  221:     [
  222:      key_auth_ext_sign_only,
  223:      legacy_server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  224:     ].
  225: 
  226: rsa_tests() ->
  227:    [
  228:     longer_chain,
  229:     cross_signed_chain,
  230:     expired_root_with_cross_signed_root
  231:    ].
  232: 
  233: tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  234:      [
  235:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  236:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  237:      ].
  238: 
  239: tls_1_2_rsa_tests() ->
  240:      [
  241:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  242:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  243:      ].
  244: 
  245: all_version_tests() ->
  246:     [
  247:      no_auth,
  248:      auth,
  249:      client_auth_custom_key,
  250:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  251:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  252:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  253:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  254:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  255:      client_auth_sni,
  256:      missing_root_cert_no_auth,
  257:      missing_root_cert_auth,
  258:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept,
  259:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject,
  260:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept,
  261:      verify_fun_always_run_client,
  262:      verify_fun_always_run_server,
  263:      incomplete_chain_auth,
  264:      no_chain_client_auth,
  265:      invalid_signature_client,
  266:      invalid_signature_server,
  267:      critical_extension_auth,
  268:      critical_extension_client_auth,
  269:      critical_extension_no_auth,
  270:      extended_key_usage_auth,
  271:      extended_key_usage_client_auth,
  272:      extended_key_usage_mixup_client,
  273:      extended_key_usage_mixup_server,
  274:      extended_key_usage_ca,
  275:      extended_key_usage_ca_invalid,
  276:      extended_key_usage_ca_any,
  277:      cert_expired,
  278:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext,
  279:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment
  280:     ].
  281: 
  282: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  283:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  284:     try application:start(crypto) of
  285: 	ok ->
  286:             Config
  287:     catch _:_ ->
  288: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  292:     ssl:stop(),
  293:     application:unload(ssl),
  294:     application:stop(crypto).
  295: 
  296: 
  297: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  298:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  299:         true  ->
  300:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  301:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  302:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  303:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  304:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  305:         false ->
  306:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  307:     end.
  308: 
  309: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  310:                                        Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  311:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  312:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config1),
  313:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  314:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  315:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  316:     [{cert_key_alg, rsa},
  317:      {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)},
  318:      {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)} |
  319:      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  320:                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  321:                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  322:                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  323:                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  324: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  325:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  326:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  327:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  328:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  329: 
  330:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  331:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  332:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  333:         true ->
  334:             #{client_config := COpts,
  335:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  336:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg},
  337:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)},
  338:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)} |
  339:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  340:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  341:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  342:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  343:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  344:         false ->
  345:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  346:     end;
  347: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  348:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  349: 
  350:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  351:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  352:     
  353:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  354:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  355:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  356:         true ->
  357:             #{client_config := COpts,
  358:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  359:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  360:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  361:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  362:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  363:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  364:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  365:         false ->
  366:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  367:     end;
  368: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  369:                                        Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  370: 
  371:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  372:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  373:         true ->
  374:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  375:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  376:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  377:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  378:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  379:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  380:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  381:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  382:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  383:                          )];
  384:         false ->
  385:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  386:     end;
  387: do_init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  388:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  389:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  390:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  391:         true ->
  392:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  393:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  394:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  395:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  396:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  397:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  398:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  399:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  400:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  401: 
  402:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  403:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  404:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  405:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  406:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  407:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  408:                          )];
  409:         false ->
  410:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  411:     end;
  412: do_init_per_group(dsa = Alg, Config0) ->
  413:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  414:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  415:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) of
  416:         true ->
  417:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  418:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  419:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  420:             ShaDSA = case Version of
  421:                          {3, 3} ->
  422:                              [{signature_algs, [{sha, dsa}]}];
  423:                          _  ->
  424:                              []
  425:                      end,
  426:             [{cert_key_alg, dsa},
  427:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  428:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}] ++ ShaDSA},
  429:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  430:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}] ++ ShaDSA} |
  431:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  432:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  433:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  434:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  435:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  436:         false ->
  437:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  438:     end;
  439: do_init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  440:     Config.
  441: 
  442: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  443:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  444: 
  445: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1, Config) ->
  446:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp256r1);
  447: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1, Config) ->
  448:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp384r1);
  449: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1, Config) ->
  450:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp521r1);
  451: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  452:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  453:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  454:     Config.
  455: 
  456: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  457:     Config.
  458: 
  459: init_ecdsa_opts(Config0, Curve) ->
  460:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  461:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  462:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  463:         true ->
  464:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_ecdsa_cert(Config0, Curve),
  465:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  466:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  467:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  468:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  469:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ COpts end},
  470:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ SOpts end} |
  471:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  472:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  473:                          )];
  474:         false ->
  475:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  476:     end.
  477: 
  478: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  545: 
  546: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  547: missing_root_cert_auth() ->
  548:     [{doc,"Must have ROOT certs to be able to verify verify peer"}].
  549: missing_root_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  550:     ServerOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)),
  551:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  552:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  553:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  554: 					      {from, self()},
  555: 					      {options, no_reuse(Version) ++ [{verify, verify_peer}
  556:                                                                              | ServerOpts]}]),
  557: 
  558:     Error = {error, {options, incompatible,
  559:                      [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]}},
  560:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Error),
  561:     
  562:     ClientOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)),
  563:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  564: 					      {from, self()},
  565: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer}
  566: 							 | ClientOpts]}]),
  567: 
  568:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, Error).
  569:     
  570: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  571: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept() ->
  572:     [{doc, "Test that the client succeeds if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  573:      " with a verify_fun that accepts the unknown CA error"}].
  574: 
  575: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  576:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  577:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  578:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  579: 			    {valid, UserState};
  580: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  581: 			    {fail, Reason};
  582: 		       (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  583: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  584: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  585: 			    {valid, UserState};
  586: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  587: 			    {valid, UserState}
  588: 		    end, []},
  589:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  590:                                           [{verify, verify_peer}, {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  591:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  592:                                           Config),
  593:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  594: 
  595: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  596: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept() ->
  597:     [{doc, "Test old style verify fun"}].
  598: 
  599: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  600:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  601:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  602:     AcceptBadCa = fun({bad_cert,unknown_ca}, Acc) ->  Acc;
  603:                      (Other, Acc) -> [Other | Acc]
  604: 		  end,
  605:     VerifyFun =
  606: 	fun(ErrorList) ->
  607: 		case lists:foldl(AcceptBadCa, [], ErrorList) of
  608: 		    [] ->    true;
  609: 		    [_|_] -> false
  610: 		end
  611: 	end,
  612:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  613:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  614:                                            {verify_fun, VerifyFun},
  615:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}], Config),
  616:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  617: 
  618: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  619: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject() ->
  620:     [{doc, "Test that the client fails if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  621:      " with a verify_fun that rejects the unknown CA error"}].
  622: 
  623: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject(Config) ->
  624:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  625:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  626:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca} = Reason, _UserState) ->
  627: 			    {fail, Reason};
  628: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  629: 			    {fail, Reason};
  630: 		       (_,{extension, UserState}, _) ->
  631: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  632: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  633: 			    {valid, UserState};
  634: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  635: 			    {valid, UserState}
  636: 		    end, []},
  637:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  638:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  639:                                            {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  640:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  641:                                           Config),
  642:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unknown_ca).
  643: 
  644: 
  645: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  646: incomplete_chain_auth() ->
  647:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify an incompleat chain when we have the certs to rebuild it"}].
  648: incomplete_chain_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  649:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  650:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  651:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  652:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  653:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  654:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  655:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),   
  656:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  657:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  658:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  659:                                                          {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
  660:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  661:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  662:                                                          {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
  663:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  664:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  665: 
  666: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  667: no_chain_client_auth() ->
  668:     [{doc,"In TLS-1.3 test that we allow sending only peer cert if chain CAs are missing and hence"
  669:       " we can not determine if client is in servers auth domain or not, so send and hope"
  670:       " that the cert chain is in the auth domain and that the server possess "
  671:       " intermediates to recreate the chain."}].
  672: no_chain_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  673:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  674:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  675:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  676:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  677:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  678:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  679:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  680:     ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  681:     [ClientRoot| _] = ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  682:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  683:                                                          {cacerts, [ClientRoot]} |
  684:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  685:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  686:                                                          {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  687:                                                          {cacerts,  ClientCas ++ ServerCas} |
  688:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  689:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  690: 
  691: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  692: verify_fun_always_run_client() ->
  693:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  694:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  695: 
  696: verify_fun_always_run_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  697:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  698:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  699:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  700:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  701:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  702: 					      {from, self()},
  703: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  704: 						     no_result, []}},
  705: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  706:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  707: 
  708:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  709:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  710:     %% to call users verify fun
  711:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  712:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  713: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  714: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  715:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  716: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  717: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  718:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  719: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  720: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  721:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  722: 			    {valid, UserState}
  723: 		    end, [0]},
  724: 
  725:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  726: 					      {host, Hostname},
  727: 					      {from, self()},
  728: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  729: 						     no_result, []}},
  730: 					      {options,
  731: 					       [{verify, verify_peer},
  732: 						{verify_fun, FunAndState}
  733: 						| ClientOpts]}]),
  734: 
  735:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  736: 
  737: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  738: verify_fun_always_run_server() ->
  739:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  740:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  741: verify_fun_always_run_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  742:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  743:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  744:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  745: 
  746:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  747:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  748:     %% to call users verify fun
  749:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  750:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  751: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  752: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  753:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  754: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  755: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  756:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  757: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  758: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  759:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  760: 			    {valid, UserState}
  761: 		    end, [0]},
  762: 
  763:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  764:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  765: 					      {from, self()},
  766: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  767: 						     no_result, []}},
  768: 					      {options,
  769:                                                no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer},
  770:                                                                                 {verify_fun, FunAndState} |
  771:                                                                                 ServerOpts]}]),
  772:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  773: 
  774:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  775: 					      {host, Hostname},
  776: 					      {from, self()},
  777: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  778: 						     no_result, []}},
  779: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  780:     
  781:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  782: 
  783: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  784: invalid_signature_client() ->

  796: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  797: critical_extension_auth() ->
  798:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  799: 
  800: critical_extension_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  801:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  802:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  803:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  804:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  805:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  806:                                                                          [{server_chain, 
  807:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  808:                                                                           {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  809:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  810:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  811:  
  812:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  813:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  814:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  815:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  816:                 {from, self()},
  817:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  no_result, []}},
  818:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  819:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  820:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  821:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  822:                 {host, Hostname},
  823:                 {from, self()},
  824:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  825:                 {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  826: 
  827:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  828: 
  829: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  830: critical_extension_client_auth() ->
  831:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  832: 
  833: critical_extension_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  834:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  835:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  836:      #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  837:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  838:                                                                          [{client_chain, 
  839:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  840:                                                                           {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  841:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  842:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  843:     
  844:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  845:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  846:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  847:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  848:                 {from, self()},
  849:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  850:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  851:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  852:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  853:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  854:                 {host, Hostname},
  855:                 {from, self()},
  856:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  857:                 {options, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]}]),
  858: 
  859:     %% This certificate has a critical extension that we don't
  860:     %% understand.  Therefore, verification should fail.          
  861:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  862:

  869:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  870:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  871:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  872:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  873:                                                                             [{server_chain, 
  874:                                                                               [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},

  877:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  878:

  882: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  883: extended_key_usage_auth() ->
  884:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in server cert"}].
  885: 
  886: extended_key_usage_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  887:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  888:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  889:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  890:                                  [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  891:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  892:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
  893:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  894:                                           [{server_chain,
  895:                                             [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  896:                                            {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  897:                                           ]),
  898:     positive_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  899: 
  900: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  901: extended_key_usage_client_auth() ->
  902:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in client and server cert"}].
  903: 
  904: extended_key_usage_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  905:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  906:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  907:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  908:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  909:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  910:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
  911:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  912:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  913:                                            {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  914: 
  915:     positive_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  916:    
  917: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  918: extended_key_usage_mixup_server() ->
  919:     [{doc,"Test cert extended_key_usage extension is always verified by having server use client extension"}].
  920: 
  921: extended_key_usage_mixup_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  922:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  923:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], false}]),
  924:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  925:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
  926:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  927:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  928:                                            {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]}]),
  929: 
  930:     ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  931:                                       [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  932:                                        {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]}]),
  933:     
  934: 
  935:     negative_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  936: 
  937: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  938: 
  939: extended_key_usage_mixup_client() ->
  940:     [{doc,"Test cert extended_key_usage extension is always verified by having client use server extension"}].
  941: 
  942: extended_key_usage_mixup_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  943:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  944:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], false}]),
  945: 
  946:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  947:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
  948:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  949:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]},
  950:                                            {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  951:     negative_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  952: 
  953: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  954: extended_key_usage_ca() ->
  955:     [{doc,"Test extended key usage in CA cert"}].
  956: 
  957: extended_key_usage_ca(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  958:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  959:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  960:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  961:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  962:     CAExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-keyUsage',
  963:                                    [keyCertSign, digitalSignature], true}]),
  964:     
  965:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  966:       server_config := ServerOpts0} =
  967:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  968:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt ++ ClientExt}],
  969:                                                            [{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  970:                                            {server_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt ++ ServerExt}],
  971:                                                            [{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  972: 
  973: 
  974:     positive_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts0, ServerOpts0, Config),
  975: 
  976:     CAExt1 =  x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  977:                                     [?'id-kp-OCSPSigning', ?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  978: 
  979:     #{client_config := ClientOpts1,
  980:       server_config := ServerOpts1} =
  981:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  982:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt ++ ClientExt}],
  983:                                                            [{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  984:                                            {server_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt ++ CAExt1}],
  985:                                                            [{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  986: 
  987:     positive_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts1, ServerOpts1, Config).
  988: 
  989: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  990: extended_key_usage_ca_invalid() ->
  991:     [{doc,"Test extended key usage in CA cert that will not validate"}].
  992: 
  993: extended_key_usage_ca_invalid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  994:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  995:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  996:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  997:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  998:     CAExt =  x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-keyUsage', [keyCertSign, cRLSign], false},
  999:                                    {?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1000:                                     [?'id-kp-OCSPSigning'], true}]),
 1001: 
 1002:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
 1003:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
 1004:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1005:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[{extensions, ClientExt}],
 1006:                                                            [{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1007:                                            {server_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt ++ ServerExt}],
 1008:                                                            [{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
 1009: 
 1010:     negative_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1011: 
 1012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1013: 
 1014: extended_key_usage_ca_any() ->
 1015:     [{doc,"Test extended key usage in CA cert"}].
 1016: 
 1017: extended_key_usage_ca_any(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1018:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1019:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
 1020:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1021:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
 1022:     CAExt =  x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1023:                                     [?anyExtendedKeyUsage, ?'id-kp-OCSPSigning'], false}]),
 1024: 
 1025:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
 1026:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
 1027:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1028:                                           [{client_chain, [[],[],
 1029:                                                            [{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1030:                                            {server_chain, [[],[{extensions, CAExt}],
 1031:                                                            [{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
 1032: 
 1033:     positive_extended_keyusage([{allow_any_ca_purpose, true} | ClientOpts],
 1034:                                ServerOpts, Config),
 1035: 
 1036:     negative_extended_keyusage(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1037: 
 1038: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1039: cert_expired() ->
 1040:     [{doc,"Test server with expired certificate"}].
 1041: 
 1042: cert_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1043:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 1044:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
 1045:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1046:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1047:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1048:                                                                         [{server_chain,
 1049:                                                                           [[],
 1050:                                                                            [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1051:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
 1052:                                                                            []
 1053:                                                                      ]},
 1054:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
 1055:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
 1056:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
 1057:     
 1058:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1059:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1060:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1061: 					      {from, self()},
 1062: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
 1063:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1064:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1065: 					      {host, Hostname},
 1066: 					      {from, self()},
 1067: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),    
 1068:     
 1069:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, certificate_expired).
 1070: 
 1071: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1072: no_auth_key_identifier_ext() ->
 1073:     [{doc, "Test cert that does not have authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
 1074: 
 1075: no_auth_key_identifier_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1076:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
 1077:       #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1078:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
 1079:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1080:                                           [{client_chain, DefaultCertConf},
 1081:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
 1082:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1083:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1084:  
 1085:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1086:     
 1087: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1088: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment() ->
 1089:     [{doc, "Test cert with keyEncipherment key_usage an no"
 1090:       " authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
 1091: 
 1092: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1093:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
 1094:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature, keyEncipherment]}]),
 1095:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1096:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
 1097:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1098:                                           [{client_chain, 
 1099:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1100:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1101:                                           ]),
 1102:     ClientOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1103:     ServerOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1104:     
 1105:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1106: 
 1107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1108: key_auth_ext_sign_only() ->
 1109:     [{doc, "Test that client with a certificate without keyEncipherment usage "
 1110:     " extension can connect to a server with restricted cipher suites "}].
 1111: key_auth_ext_sign_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1112:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
 1113:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature]}]),
 1114:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1115:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
 1116:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1117:                                           [{client_chain, 
 1118:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1119:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1120:                                           ]),
 1121:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1122:     ClientOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1123:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {ciphers, 
 1124:                                           ssl_test_lib:rsa_non_signed_suites(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version))} 
 1125:                  | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1126:     
 1127:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1128: 
 1129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1130: cert_auth_in_first_ca() ->
 1131:     [{doc,"Test cert auth will be available in first ca in chain, make it happen by only having one"}].
 1132: cert_auth_in_first_ca(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1133:     #{} =
 1134:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1135:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1136:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1137:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}], 
 1138:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1139:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}), 
 1140:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)],
 1141:     ServerOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)],
 1142: 
 1143:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1144: 
 1145: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1146: 
 1147: 
 1148: longer_chain() ->
 1149:     [{doc,"Test depth option"}].
 1150: longer_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1151:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1152:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1153:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1154:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}],
 1155:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1156:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}]],
 1157:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1158:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1159:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 1160:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
 1161:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1162:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1163:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1164:     
 1165:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
 1166:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version), Config),
 1167:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
 1168:                                            {depth, 5},
 1169:                                            {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
 1170:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)]++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) , Config),
 1171:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1172: 
 1173: cross_signed_chain() ->
 1174:     [{doc, "Manual test of chain with duplicate entries that is cross signing certs are present."}].
 1175: cross_signed_chain(Config)
 1176:   when is_list(Config) ->
 1177:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1178:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1179:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1180:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1181:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1182: 
 1183:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1184:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1185:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1186:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key3}],
 1187:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1188:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1189: 
 1190:     #{client_config := ClientOptsNew} =
 1191:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1192:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1193:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key4}],
 1194:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key1}]],
 1195:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1196: 
 1197:     ServerCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1198:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1199:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1200: 
 1201:     {[Peer,CI1,CI2,CROld], CROld} = chain_and_root(ClientOpts0),
 1202:     {[_Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CRNew], CRNew} = chain_and_root(ClientOptsNew),
 1203: 
 1204:     ServerCas = [CRNew|ServerCas0 -- [CROld]],
 1205:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1206:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1, ServerOpts0, {cacerts, ServerCas})]
 1207:                                           ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1208:                                           Config),
 1209:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1210:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1211:                                                                           lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1212:                                                                              {cert, [Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CI1,CI2,CRNew,CROld]}),
 1213:                                                                           {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1214:                                           Config),
 1215:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
 1216:     ClientOpts2 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1217:                                                           lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1218:                                                                            lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1219:                                                                                             {cert, [Peer,CI1,CI1New,CI2,CI2New,CROld,CRNew]}),
 1220:                                                                            {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1221:                                            Config),
 1222:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts2, ServerOpts, Config),
 1223:     ok.
 1224: 
 1225: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root() ->
 1226:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify a chain with an expired Root Cert if there is an alternative chain with"
 1227:       " a cross signed Root CA further down the chain that is however not present in the sent chain"}].
 1228: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1229: 
 1230:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1231:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1232:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1233:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1234:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1235:     Key6 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6),
 1236:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1237: 
 1238:     %% Create expired ROOT
 1239:     #{cert := Root} = SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{key, Key1},
 1240:                                                                     {validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1241:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
 1242:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1243:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
 1244:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1245:                                                       peer => [{key, Key4}]},
 1246:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key5}],
 1247:                                                       peer => [{key, Key6}]}}),
 1248:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1249:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
 1250:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ServerOpts0,
 1251: 
 1252:     SCert = proplists:get_value(cert, ServerOpts),
 1253:     SCerts = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts),
 1254: 
 1255:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, SCerts}),
 1256:     {ok, Root, [_Peer, CA1, CA2, Root]} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(SCert, ets:new(foo, []), 
 1257:                                                                             ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1258: 
 1259:     OTPCA1 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA1, otp),
 1260:     OTPCA2 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA2, otp),
 1261: 
 1262:     TBS1 = OTPCA1#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1263:     TBS2 = OTPCA2#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1264: 
 1265:     Issuer = TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1266: 
 1267:     SubjectPublicKeyInfo = TBS2#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subjectPublicKeyInfo,
 1268: 
 1269:     AltCrossRoot = public_key:pkix_sign(TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Issuer,
 1270:                                                                  subjectPublicKeyInfo = SubjectPublicKeyInfo}, Key2),
 1271: 
 1272:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts),
 1273: 
 1274:     %% Only expired ROOT present
 1275:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts], ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired),
 1276:     %% Only CROSS ROOT present
 1277:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1278:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)], ServerOpts, Config),
 1279:     %% Both expired ROOT and CROSS ROOT present
 1280:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1281:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot | ClientCas0]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)],
 1282:                             ServerOpts, Config).
 1283: 
 1284: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1285: %% TLS 1.3 Test cases  -----------------------------------------------
 1286: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1287: hello_retry_request() ->
 1288:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can request a new group when the client's first key share"
 1289:       "is not supported"}].
 1290: 
 1291: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
 1292:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1293:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1294:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1295:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1296:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1297:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]} | ClientOpts0],
 1298:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1299: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1300: custom_groups() ->
 1301:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can select a common group for key-exchange"}].
 1302: 
 1303: custom_groups(Config) ->
 1304:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1305:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1306: 
 1307:     %% Set versions
 1308:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1309:                   {supported_groups, [x448, secp256r1, secp384r1]}|ServerOpts0],
 1310:     ClientOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1311:     ClientOpts = [{supported_groups,[secp384r1, secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts1],
 1312:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1313: 
 1314: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1315: %% Triggers a Server Alert as ssl client does not have a certificate with a
 1316: %% signature algorithm supported by the server (signature_algorithms_cert extension
 1317: %% of CertificateRequest does not contain the algorithm of the client certificate).
 1318: %% ssl client sends an empty certificate.
 1319: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
 1320:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2) : Test client authentication with unsupported "
 1321:        "signature_algorithm_cert"}].
 1322: 
 1323: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
 1324:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1325:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1326:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1327:                   {signature_algs,
 1328:                    [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1329:                   %% Skip rsa_pkcs1_sha256!
 1330:                   {signature_algs_cert, [rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pkcs1_sha512]},
 1331:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1332:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1333:     case Version of
 1334:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 1335:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required);
 1336:         _  ->
 1337:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unsupported_certificate)
 1338:     end.
 1339: 
 1340: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1341: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
 1342:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2): Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm"}].
 1343: 
 1344: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
 1345:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1346:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1347:     ClientOpts = [{signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ClientOpts0],
 1348:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1349:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_sha1, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1350:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1351:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1352: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1353: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
 1354:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication."}].
 1355: 
 1356: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
 1357:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1358:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1359:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1360:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1361:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1362:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
 1363:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1364:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1365: 
 1366:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1367: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1368: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
 1369:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client sends an empty " 
 1370:        "certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1371: 
 1372: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
 1373:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1374:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1375:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1376:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1377: 
 1378:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1379:     %% Set versions
 1380:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1381:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1382:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, false},
 1383:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1384:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1385:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1386:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1387: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1388: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
 1389:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client "
 1390:        "sends an empty certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1391: 
 1392: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
 1393:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1394:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1395:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1396:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1397: 
 1398:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1399:     %% Set versions
 1400:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1401:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1402:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1403:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1404:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1405:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1406:    
 1407:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required).
 1408: 
 1409: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1410: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1() ->
 1411:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1412:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1413: 
 1414: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1(Config) ->
 1415:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1416:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1417:     %% Set versions
 1418:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1419:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1420:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1421:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1422:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1423: 
 1424:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1425: 
 1426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1427: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1() ->
 1428:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1429:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1430: 
 1431: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1(Config) ->
 1432:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1433:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1434:     %% Set versions
 1435:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1436:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1437:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1438:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1439:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],

 1442:

 1444: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1() ->
 1445:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1446:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1447: 
 1448: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1(Config) ->

 1450:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1451:     %% Set versions
 1452:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1453:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp512r1_sha256,
 1454:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}
 1455:                  | ServerOpts0],
 1456:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1457:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1458:                                     ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
